features.featureTitle: Create a new `/terms` route in the TanStack Router configuration (App.tsx) that renders a dedicated TermsOfUsePage component, following the same pattern as the existing `/about` route.

Create a TermsOfUsePage component that renders all 14 sections of the Terms of Service exactly as provided. All section headings, body text, bullet lists, sub-sections (e.g. Feedback, Mandatory Binding Arbitration, Class Action Waiver, Jury Trial Waiver, Small Claims, Emergency Relief, Venue), and the ALL-CAPS disclaimer blocks must be preserved verbatim. The support email must display as support@stackteacher.com (mailto link) and all references must read 'Stack Teacher'. The page must include the opening bold warning paragraph.

In the site footer (Layout.tsx), add a 'Terms of Use' link in the same footer section that contains the existing 'About Us' link, placed directly next to it. The link must navigate to the /terms route.
